mapper.insert: insert into monitored_system (system_id, name, description, db_product, db_ip, db_port, db_user, db_pwd, schema, create_time, update_time) values (#{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbPort,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{dbUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schema,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update monitored_system set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, db_product = #{dbProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, db_ip = #{dbIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, db_port = #{dbPort,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, db_user = #{dbUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, db_pwd = #{dbPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, schema = #{schema,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where system_id = #{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select 'false' as QUERYID,system_id, name, description, db_product, db_ip, db_port, db_user, db_pwd, schema, create_time, update_time from monitored_system where system_id = #{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select system_id, name, description, db_product, db_ip, db_port, db_user, db_pwd, schema, create_time, update_time from monitored_system
